hero.connect: Connect, Live, and Grow with Your Community
hero.connectDesc: Wasla brings residents, services, and management together in one smart ecosystem
hero.bookDesc: Doctors, restaurants, gyms, and technicians — all just one tap away.
hero.smartDesc: Order food, request a ride, and track everything in real time with Wasla.
hero.stayDesc: Share posts, chat, and join community groups to make your area feel like home.

about.wasla: Wasla connects residents, services, and management into one digital ecosystem. Empowering communities to live, share, and interact seamlessly — making every neighborhood feel more alive and connected.
about.manage: Manage your daily needs from one intuitive platform.
about.access: Access reliable community services and providers.
about.strenght: Strengthen bonds and boost community wellbeing.

services.title: Our Smart Services
services.subtitle: Empowering communities with advanced tools and seamless digital experiences
services.communityDesc: Easily connect residents, admins, and service providers in one place
services.propertyDesc: Manage facilities, maintenance, and building updates digitally
services.securityDesc: Access secure entry, visitor logs, and incident tracking tools
services.notificationsDesc: Stay updated with instant alerts, news, and community updates
services.automationDesc: Automate reports, billing, and communication effortlessly
services.analyticsDesc: Gain valuable insights about usage, activity, and efficiency

landing.weekDesc: Each doctor publishes weekly medical services such as checkups, home visits, follow-ups, and specialty-based consultations.
landing.bookDesc: Residents can book available slots instantly with real-time confirmation.
landing.renvueDesc: Doctors track weekly/monthly revenue, appointments, and cancellations.
landing.profileDesc: Each doctor has a profile showing specialty, experiences, ratings, and services.
landing.paymentDesc: Payments happen safely inside the platform with full history tracking.
landing.ratingDesc: Residents rate doctors after each service to maintain trust and quality.
landing.doctorServDesc: Doctors inside the community provide weekly services based on their specialties. Residents can book instantly, and doctors track bookings, earnings, and appointments through their personalized dashboard.
landing.menuDesc: Restaurants update their weekly menu including specials, combos, and seasonal dishes.
landing.tableDesc: Customers can book tables instantly with real-time availability.
landing.trackDesc: Track weekly/monthly revenue, orders, and cancellations easily.
landing.resProDesc: Profiles include cuisine type, ratings, services, and customer reviews.
landing.onlineDesc: Safe and easy online ordering with full order history.
landing.feedDesc: Customers rate restaurants after each service to maintain quality.
landing.resServDesc: Explore community restaurants offering various services. Track menus, bookings, revenue, and customer feedback through a unified platform.
landing.healthDesc: Track heart rate, calories, and progress.
landing.planDesc: Flexible plans for individuals and families.
landing.gymServDesc: Explore the gym's features and services designed for community residents, from classes to personal training and health tracking.
landing.verfiyDesc: All drivers are verified for safety and reliability.
landing.carbookDesc: Book a driver instantly with real-time confirmation.
landing.carServDesc: Verified drivers inside the community ready for quick trips, errands, and emergency requests.
landing.elecDesc: Certified electricians for safe and quick electrical fixes.
landing.plumDesc: Professional plumbers for installations and repairs.
landing.techDesc: Skilled AC technicians for maintenance and emergency support.
landing.techServDesc: Skilled professionals ready to provide fast and reliable home maintenance and repair services.
landing.reply: Questions or partnership requests? Send us a message and we’ll reply within 24 hours.
landing.soon: Message sent — we will contact you soon.

footer.about: Wasla connects residents and services to make communities smarter, simpler, and more connected

tips.drinkWater: Drink 2–3 liters of water daily to stay hydrated and energized.
tips.walkDaily: Take a 30-minute walk daily to boost cardiovascular health.
tips.eatFruitsVeg: Eat at least 5 servings of fruits and vegetables every day.
tips.shortBreaks: Take short breaks during work to relax your eyes and body.
tips.sleepSchedule: Maintain a regular sleep schedule for better mental health.
tips.washHands: Wash your hands regularly to prevent germs and infections.
tips.deepBreathing: Practice deep breathing exercises to reduce stress and anxiety.
tips.limitSugaryDrinks: Limit sugary drinks and opt for water or herbal teas.
tips.morningStretch: Stretch every morning to improve flexibility and posture.
tips.organizeWorkspace: Keep your workspace organized to boost productivity and reduce stress.
tips.noSkippingBreakfast: Avoid skipping breakfast to maintain energy levels throughout the day.
tips.strengthTraining: Incorporate strength training twice a week to build muscle and bone health.
tips.mindfulEating: Practice mindful eating to avoid overeating and improve digestion.
tips.checkUps: Schedule regular check-ups with your doctor for preventive care.
tips.takeStairs: Take the stairs instead of the elevator when possible for better fitness.
tips.limitScreenTime: Limit screen time before bed to improve sleep quality.
tips.wholeGrains: Include whole grains in your diet for sustained energy.
tips.listenMusic: Listen to music or podcasts to relax and uplift your mood.
tips.firstAid: Keep a small first-aid kit at home for emergencies.
tips.planMeals: Plan your meals in advance to eat healthier and save time.
tips.indoorPlants: Keep indoor plants to improve air quality and reduce stress.
tips.sunscreen: Wear sunscreen daily to protect your skin from UV damage.
tips.gratitude: Practice gratitude by writing down three things you're thankful for each day.
tips.sunlight: Take a few minutes outside every day to enjoy sunlight and fresh air.
tips.socialConnections: Maintain social connections to improve mental well-being.
tips.declutterHome: Declutter your home regularly for a cleaner, calmer environment.
tips.newHobby: Try a new hobby or activity weekly to stimulate your mind.
tips.activeTransport: Use public transport, walk, or cycle to reduce stress and stay active.
tips.reusableBottle: Keep a reusable water bottle with you to remind yourself to hydrate.
tips.laughOften: Laugh often—it boosts mood and strengthens your immune system.

admin.serviceDashboardDesc: Monitor performance and engagement of service providers
